content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (0, 0) with coal as fuel.

### Burner Mining Drill at position(41, -82)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (41, -82) with coal as fuel and a chest at position (40.5, -83.5) to collect coal.

### Coal Collection System at position(41, -82)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (41, -82) and a chest at position (40.5, -83.5) to collect coal.

### Iron Ore Mining System at position(-15, -50)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (-15, -50) with coal as fuel and a chest at position (-15.5, -51.5) to collect iron ore.

### Iron Ore Transport System at position(-15, -50)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (-15, -50), a chest at position (-15.5, -51.5) to collect iron ore, and a burner inserter at position (-15.5, -52.5) to take iron ore from the chest.

### Iron Ore Smelting System at position(4, 0)
Consists of a furnace at position (4, 0) with coal as fuel, and a burner inserter at position (1.5, 0.5) to put iron ore into the furnace.

### Transport Belt System at position(-15, -51)
Consists of a transport belt at position (-13.5, -51.5) and a furnace at position (0, 0) with a burner inserter at position (1.5, 0.5) to connect the transport belt.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting items without required sub-ingredients
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients for an item are available in the inventory before attempting to craft the item.
- Check the recipe for the item to determine the required sub-ingredients and their quantities.

### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Make sure to have the required item in the inventory before attempting to place an entity.
- Check the inventory to ensure that the required item is available before placing an entity.

### Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
- Ensure that the position where the entity is to be placed is not occupied by another entity.
- Check the position before attempting to place an entity to avoid errors.

### Errors when extracting or placing items without proper setup
- Ensure that the entity is properly set up and has the required items or space before attempting to extract or place items.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to determine if there are any issues that need to be addressed before extracting or placing items.

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient quantity in inventory
- Ensure that the inventory has sufficient quantity of the item to be inserted before attempting to insert it.
- Check the inventory to ensure that the required item is available in sufficient quantity before inserting it.

### Errors when placing entities at positions without required items in inventory
- Make sure to have the required item in the inventory before attempting to place an entity at a specific position.
- Check the inventory to ensure that the required item is available before placing an entity at a specific position.

### Errors when placing entities with collisions
- Ensure that the position where the entity is to be placed does not have any collisions with existing entities.
- Check the position and nearby entities before attempting to place an entity to avoid collisions.

### Errors when placing entities in invalid positions
- Ensure that the position where the entity is to be placed is valid and can be placed on.
- Check the position and nearby entities before attempting to place an entity to avoid invalid positions.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the required items are in the inventory before attempting to connect entities.
- Check the inventory to ensure that the required items are available before connecting entities.

### Errors when refueling burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill is in a valid state to be refueled before attempting to refuel it.
- Check the burner mining drill's status to determine if it needs to be refueled.

### Errors when checking entity status
- Ensure that the entity is in a valid state before attempting to check its status.
- Check the entity's status to determine if it is working, waiting for source items, or has no ingredients.
